text:
- Peach basically connects
the advertising ecosystem
basically making all the component parts
work better together.

Peach was subjected to a
variety of cyber attacks
and we needed to take immediate action

and we needed a solution that
would seamlessly integrate

with our estate without having
a complex mix of vendors

or installing any agents
on our infrastructure.
Amazon Guard GT and the combination
of AWS web application firewall

and AWS web application
firewall security automation
provided us the protection that we needed

to prevent cyber attacks
on our infrastructure.
It didn't need installation of any agents

and it seamlessly integrated
with our environment.

The http flood protection,
the probe and scanners,

and the IP reputational
list reduced the traffic
and actually blocked traffic as well.

We didn't have any stressed
clients or our support teams

and our developers didn't
need to go through many logs
to go and write instant reports.
This was a big win for Peach.
(upbeat music)
